entries.title: Bachelor of Computer Application - Computer Science
Higher Secondary Education | Class 12th | State Board
Student's Performance Prediction (ML Dashboard)
bulletPoints: Developed an interactive ML dashboard using Streamlit to predict students' final grades and pass/fail outcomes.
Built and deployed regression and classification models using Scikit-learn with proper feature scaling and label encoding.
Added clear visual insights to help users understand predictions and feature importance.

entries.title: Trim & Go (Barber Booking App)
bulletPoints: Developed a complete barber booking system with separate client and admin apps using Flutter, Firebase, and Riverpod for real-time service scheduling and management.
Implemented secure authentication, appointment booking workflows, user profile handling, and admin-side booking oversight with Cloud Firestore as the backend.

entries.title: Weather App
bulletPoints: Developed a responsive weather application with real-time temperature, forecasts, and additional climate metrics using Flutter and the OpenWeather API.
Implemented city-based search, dynamic UI updates, and API data parsing with Dart, delivering a smooth and modern user experience.
